name: Relaxa-Type
description:
Description:
A relaxing typing game wherein you can practice your typing speed and accuracy.

How to play:
- Select a category, and then an item from your chosen category
- The WPM calculation does not start until you've typed your first character
- Incorrect input will result in nothing happening, so you will never need to press backspace
- Press Space at the end of a line to progress to the next line

Assets:
- All the images and sounds have been accessed from pixabay.com.
- All the fonts have been accessed from fonts.google.com.

Changelog:
v1.06 changes
        - Added the ability to create your own texts.
